CardData.Name: Midas Touch
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies for 35 damage. 35% chance to inflict Awe for one turn. (Stuns enemy and prevents them from attacking for one turn.)

CardData.Name: Watch Out Below
CardData.Description: Surprise the enemy from above by attacking for 70 damage. If the attack lands as a critical hit, draw 1 card.

CardData.Name: Prepare for Battle
CardData.Description: Your attack power increases by 25% on your next attack.

CardData.Name: All or Nothing
CardData.Description: Increase your evasion by 25% for 2 turns. If an attack lands while this buff is active, take 25% increased damage.
